http.title: Customised Swimming Accessories and Printed Swim Hats & Caps
http.html:
Need some help?

+44(0)1384 262 335  |  sales@swimhatco.com

Free Shipping - UK & Worldwide*

Home of the Great British printed swimming hats... (Prices from £1.95) 

EUROPE'S LARGEST COLOUR RANGE OF SILICONE SWIMMING CAPS!


"This Company has been really helpful in getting my new swim school merchandise sorted. They dealt with my queries well & generally gave super service. I haven't been in touch with them for a while but about to very soon for reorders. They were very good in sourcing a product I wanted but was not available on their product lists. Thank you”


Natasha Duquemin - Sarnia Sealions

"It's been a pleasure from start to finish, working with The Swim Hat Company to design and produce our very own caps. The swim caps themselves are of excellent quality and are competitively priced. I chose these guys to design our club swim caps after being recommended. They weren't wrong!"


Jon E - Hartlepool

"Just got home to our new hat design and colour! Fab, fab, fab! Fantastic service all the way as well!"


Liz Statto Kearslake - Stockport Metro

"Thank you so much for your brilliant service with our swimming hat order - perfect design and really quick turnaround."


Kerry Perks - Rugby Swimming Club

"Thank you swim hat for the most amazingly quick turnaround of an order after we had been let down for a primary school event - imagine the sadness of those young children if you hadn't of stepped in. 48 hour turnaround after I'd been quoted 6 weeks - amazing. Definitely wont be going anywhere else in future and we're off to the primary relays in style now!"


Julie Van der Helstraete - Gurnard Primary Schoo

"Dave, Aaron & Sam, Unbelievable service!! Artwork spot on!!Hats arrived yesterday and we had only been discussing that they were in production the day before. I have many swimming contacts I will drop them an e-mail and tell them how great you all are. What a pleasure.......Keep doing what you're doing, Happy Day,"


Claire Browse - Marina swim club

"Order arrived today and they are fabulous, thank you so much!"


Lorraine - Woodham Ferrers Swim Club

"We have recently had our uniforms done by them with our logo embroidered on the chest. We really like how they have turned out. Thank you!"


Mary - Mercury Training

"Brilliant quality swim hats and customers service is fantastic, thank you from Dolphin Swim School with Elaina and Linda"


Elaina James - Dolphin Swim School

I can’t remember whether I thanked you for the Sports Relief printing ....it was Perfect !!!!
So thank you , everybody loved it and appreciated the professionalism and speed with which the job was done 
Also I hoped Becky at The BBC thanked you for your donation to Sports Relief !!


Jo Thompson - BBC

High quality print & embroidery - all in one place...

...and the design skills to bring it all together.

We’re proud to have an in-house design team as well as a brigade of printers on hand.  Regardless how much or little information you can supply, your artwork will be returned for approval in as few as 48 hours.

Click here to learn more

Previously based in Brierley Hill, West Midlands, our family founded the business in January 2000.

We have now expanded nearby Amblecote, Stourbridge to a much larger premises.  We have an enviable reputation built on the exceptionally high quality products and genuine personal service we provide.


We have in-house capability to produce a wide range of printed and embroidered items, but specialise in swimming hats, swimwear and accessories to schools, colleges, universities, swimming clubs and trade customers.


Need help?

Forty Years of Knowhow

With over forty years of experience in the sports printing industry you know you’re in great hands when you deal with the Swim Hat Company. No matter what the issue, we’re just a phone call away.

Telephone: 01384 262 331 Email: Sales@swimhatco.com 






Proud to have helped

some of the World’s best swimming and sporting clubs

Tel: +44(0)1384 262 335  |  sales@swimhatco.com

Looking for someone to call you? - Just click here

SHC Leisure Limited
T/A The Swimhat Company
Unit B
ESD Business Park
Wollaston Road
Stourbridge
West Midlands
DY8 4HE

2019 © SHC Leisure Limited   |  Registered in England No. 09315958  |  VAT Reg. No. 783946278  |  Terms & Conditions  |  Privacy Policy  |
